title: The Movies story
creator_credit: SL Film Productions and Gerald A Schiller
brief_description: Traces the history of film from 1895 to 1915, beginning with Edison’s first experiments and concluding with Chaplin’s early shorts. Emphasises the contributions of Melies, Griffith and Chaplin. Narrated by William Wintersole.
creator_credit_for_label: SL Film Productions and Gerald A Schiller
